column2: Do not try to invade the Valyrian Freehold…
Do not provoke the Bronze King…

column1: LOADING_TIP_9;Braavos is the weakest republic in the game, but has the potential to bceome the strongest.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: The Arbor/Oldtown feud will be bloody…
Do not allow the Ironborn to unite…
Do not invade Dorne by land…

column1: LOADING_TIP_20;As Riverrun it is best to swear fealty to someone, or you may soon be destroyed.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: Prince Tristifer 'The Hammer of Justice' Mudd

column1: LOADING_TIP_23;As the Viceroy of the Valyrian Freehold, beware revolts...;;;;;;;;;x

column2: Do not let the moral authority of the Seven fall…
The Seven Kingdoms can be formed only through fear and blood…
